metadata.title: CVE-2016-2451 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: codecs/on2/dec/SoftVPX.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-05-01 does not validate VPX output buffer sizes, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated byobtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 27597103.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
